alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/... At 544 PM EDT/444 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Hiland Park, or 7 miles east of Lynn Haven, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, College Station, Bayou George, West Panama City, Camp Flowers, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach, Brannonville and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
